Title: Software Development Environment (SDE) Administrator
JD:
About the job
    


          At Lockheed Martin, we believe that by applying the highest standards of business ethics and forward-thinking, everything is within our reach – and yours as a Lockheed Martin employee. We value your unique skills and expertise, and we aim to give back continuously by offering a wide variety of benefits and amenities to help our employees live flexible, balanced, and fulfilling lives at, and outside of, work.
Lockheed Martin is looking for a Software Development Environment (SDE) Administrator to work in a fast-paced and changing environment in Huntsville AL
This Position's Responsibilities Include
This position will support the Software Development Environment (SDE) Team to ensure the C2BMC software development and integration staff has the required tools and processes in place to develop and integrate the C2BMC system.
 Implement and maintain an integrated software development environment across the two C2BMC software development sites (Huntsville AL and Colorado Springs CO). Perform necessary System Administration functions to support the SDE team and SDE applications. Integrate new technology and tools into the C2BMC software development environment. Document the configuration and use of the SDE and assist with training and mentoring for the software developers using the toolset. Perform periodic upgrades and maintenance on the toolset. Work with Configuration Management and Program Operations to manage software licenses for the two development sites.
This position is for an entry level systems administrator to support a C2BMC product team in Huntsville AL. The selected candidate will be given tasks appropriate for their level and will work with mentors to develop their skills as needed.
